t = int(raw_input(""))
while t:
    A = []
    B = []
    n = raw_input("")
    m = raw_input("")
    x = len(n)
    
    for i in range(x):
        A.append(int(n[i]))
        B.append(int(m[i]))
        
    
    count1 = 0
    count2 = 0
    a = 0
    b = 0
    for j in range(len(A)):
        if A[j] == 0:
            a = a + 1
            
    if (a == len(A)) or (a == 0):
        print "Unlucky Chef"
    
    else:
        for k in range(x):
            if A[k] == 0 and B[k] == 1:
                count1 = count1 + 1
            if A[k] == 1 and B[k] == 0:
                count2 = count2 + 1
        print "Lucky Chef"
        print max(count1,count2)     
        
    t = t-1
